welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pililla, a charming city known for its stunning views of the windmills and lush greenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the beauty and culture our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles most international flights, including major airlines such as Philippine Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is the primary hub for Philippine Airlines and handles domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, it is the hub for Cebu Pacific and handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it handles all domestic flights for smaller airlines such as AirAsia and Tigerair Philippines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device, additional time can be purchased.
